law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Blossom honey" or "nectar honey" means honey that comes from nectars of plants.
"Honeydew honey" means honey that comes mainly from excretions of plant-sucking insects (Hemiptera) on the living parts of plants or secretions of living parts of plants.
